/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A blue and white bus is seen in motion on the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
